title: Exceptions to Maximum Lot Size
summary: Lists exceptions where maximum lot size requirements may be waived.
requirements: Where underlying lot lines must be removed to eliminate non-conformities and results in no net loss of housing
Where an adjacent substandard lot of less than 25' in width is combined with another lot and results in no net loss of housing
Where the resultant number of lots increases or stays the same and results in no net loss of housing
notes: Any ONE of these exceptions allows waiver of maximum lot size

title: Special Regulations for Substandard Lots
summary: Special building restrictions that apply to substandard lots.
requirements: Maximum building height is single-story and 17' instead of 30'

requirements.rule: required street-side yard is 10' instead of 16'
garage must be in rear half of lot instead of 75' back from front lot line

title: Parking Space Standards
summary: Defines parking space requirements and dimensions for residential lots.
requirements: Two spaces are required on the lot per dwelling
Parking spaces may NOT be located in the required front yard or first 10 ft of required street side yard
2nd dwelling units have same parking requirements
No underground parking garages except by variance
One of the two spaces must be covered
To be considered detached, a covered-parking structure must be a minimum of 3' from the main dwelling
Minimum size for an uncovered space is 8.5' x 18'
Minimum clearance inside a covered parking structure to be 10' x 20' for each space
Two-car garage or carport to be 20' x 20' clear inside
Clear area for parking space must be free of other uses
excludes: Water heaters, clothes washers or dryer, bicycle parking facilities in parking space clear area
notes: All requirements must be satisfied simultaneously
